description: Erection of single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph A.1(j)(iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and would not be lawful.

The red outline in the location plan does not show the land required for access to the site from a public road/ highway. Please revise the red outline in the location plan to show the access from the public roadNoteThe Ordnance Survey based site location plan needs to be in scale 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.
